post_body: Luxair Flight 9642 will be featured in Season 25

commenti.body:
Wish mentor pilot would make an episode about it. Anyways like his content. 


Don't know this show
Air crash investigation, a Canadian show apparently.
Came here late to say the same thing :) Mentour Pilot is one of my favorites. He dives technically into what caused the accident and he's also very respectful.
Some airline even had a few episode on their entertainment system. A bit weird to offer that to passengers while they hurdle through the air at +900 kph
This is my go-to series to watch while waiting for my boarding to start.
